src:
Potret Gunung Semeru 'Bertopi' yang Bikin Kangen Netizen
07 Nov 2019, 19:18 by Istimewa



Begitu cantik dan netizen pun bertanya-tanya kapan jalur pendakian Gunung Semeru akan dibuka (Foto: Taman Nasional Bromo Tengger Semeru/Instagram)



Dari akun Instagram resmi Taman Nasional Bromo Tengger Semeru (TNBTS), Kamis (7/11/2019), terlihat awan lenticular menyelimuti puncak Gunung Semeru. Pemandangan ini memang sering terjadi (Foto: Taman Nasional Bromo Tengger Semeru/Instagram)



TNBTS juga menjelaskan bahwa terbentuknya awan tersebut akibat pergerakan angin yang menabrak pegunungan atau bukit (Foto: Taman Nasional Bromo Tengger Semeru/Instagram)



Momen dijadikan TNBTS menarik simpati pendaki sekaligus mengabarkan bahwa Gunung Semeru masih ditutup (Foto: Taman Nasional Bromo Tengger Semeru/Instagram)



Gunung Semeru ditutup dari tanggal 22 September 2019 lalu dan belum ada informasi mengenai pembukaan jalur pendakiannya kembali. Sejumlah netizen sudah kangen mendaki gunung ini (Foto: Taman Nasional Bromo Tengger Semeru/Instagram)


Jakarta - Gunung Semeru pamer "topi" hari ini. Foto kecantikannya itu langsung sukses bikin netizen kangen untuk mendakinya. Kapan sih jalur pendakiannya dibuka lagi?
text:
A portrait of Mount Semeru 'Hat' which makes Kangen Netizens
Nov 7 2019, 19:18 by Special



It was so beautiful and netizens wondered when the hiking trail of Mount Semeru would be opened (Photo: Bromo Tengger Semeru National Park / Instagram)



From the official Instagram account of the Bromo Tengger Semeru National Park (TNBTS), Thursday (11/07/2019), visible lenticular clouds covered the summit of Mount Semeru. This scene often happens (Photo: Bromo Tengger Semeru National Park / Instagram)



TNBTS also explained that the formation of these clouds was due to the movement of wind that hit mountains or hills (Photo: Bromo Tengger Semeru National Park / Instagram)



The moment made TNBTS attracted the sympathy of climbers as well as preaching that Mount Semeru is still closed (Photo: Bromo Tengger Semeru National Park / Instagram)



Mount Semeru was closed from September 22, 2019 and there has been no information regarding the opening of the hiking trail again. A number of netizens have missed climbing this mountain (Photo: Bromo Tengger Semeru National Park / Instagram)


Jakarta - Mount Semeru is showing off "hat" today. The beauty photo was immediately successful to make netizens miss to climb it. When does the hiking trail open again?
